content:
bdbcat pushed 32 commits to branch v5.12.x. Commits by bdbcat (26), leamas (4), nohal (1) and others (1).

  • build: Revise authors.adoc handling - #4653 (13114e00c94)
  • Adapt/refactor APConsole to support Wayland graphics pipeline. (7c4d47d7847)
  • Allow NMEA0183 sentences without checksums (ef49dd30766)
  • tests: buffer_tests: adapt n0183 to 5f8a23e28 (4245b85106e)
  • Correct SVG in-lined icon rendering on ubuntu focal (9abb789b2a8)
  • Simply SVG "trash-bin" icon for improved compatibility (617748fa5da)
  • Improve ownship rendering during smooth jump animation. (8c839f92ab1)
  • PluginHandler: Mark plugin as loadable after uninstall - #4654 (6b41dc85444)
  • Don't create build stamps for system plugins - #4654 (5140288e731)
  • Correct APConsole intialization, Android (5a74f37aca2)
  • Correct GRIB_pi fault for Android, Request dialog not required. (7ecdf242e19)
  • Correct fault handling N0183 messages from plugins. (08bb8a9b871)
  • Correct compound typo (95d78794db9)
  • Install asciidoc dependency on macOS in CI scripts (#4660) (ba33b398ab1)
  • Improve APConsole update logic, linux. (fc7483a9c3c)
  • Correct APConsole position logic for split screen modes. (e9a5c334778)
  • Correct fault on deleting active route, when using N2K serial output port. (6ba32d4fbac)
  • Improve APConsole management during screen configuration changes. (58cf979b9f0)
  • Correct and document prior commit. (c3d10e78c53)
  • Implement improved config save on app shutdown, Android (9e3effcf161)
    [and 12 more commit(s)]

bdbcat pushed 1 commit to branch v5.12.x. Commits by nohal (1).

  • Revert "Install asciidoc dependency on macOS in CI scripts (#4660)" (8540f11364c)
